entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 6:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.4°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle this evening then to flurries before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
